00050 #ifndef MAX
00051 #define MAX(A,B)        ((A) > (B) ? (A) : (B))
00052 #endif
00053 
00054 #ifndef MIN
00055 #define MIN(A,B)        ((A) < (B) ? (A) : (B))
00056 #endif
00057 
00058 #ifndef ROUND
00059 #define ROUND(A)        ((A) >= 0 ? (int)((A)+.5) : -(int)(.5-(A)))
00060 #endif

00067 inline void printQString(QString q)
00068 {
00069         std::cerr << q.latin1() << std::endl;
00070 }

00072 #ifndef BATCH_PROCESSING
00074 #define QTWARNING(MSG_) QMessageBox::warning(NULL,"GraspIt!",MSG_,QMessageBox::Ok, \
00075                                                                                          Qt::NoButton,Qt::NoButton)
00076 #else
00077 //If batch processing is enabled we supress error messages that require user attention
00078 //alternatively, we could redirect this into a log file
00079 #define QTWARNING(MSG_) printQString(MSG_);
00080 #endif

00091 //useful macros for standardizing error printing
00092 #define pr_error(EXPR_)                         \
00093 {                                               \
00094     fprintf(stderr,">>!>> ");                   \
00095     fprintf(stderr,EXPR_);                      \
00096     fprintf(stderr,"\n");                       \
00097 }
00098 
00099 // EXPR_ must be of the form: (stderr,"..%...%...%...",args)
00100 #define pr_errArgs(EXPR_)                       \
00101 {                                               \
00102     fprintf(stderr,">>!>> ");                   \
00103     fprintf EXPR_;                              \
00104     fprintf(stderr,"\n");                       \
00105 }
